ogDescription: comedian betty white honored at the 2018 emmy awards

card_1.cardText:
> _aItas incredible to stay in a career this long and still have people put up with you. I wish they did that at home.a_

Betty White

card_10.cardText:
96-year-old Betty White still making people laugh as she was honored at the 2018 Emmy Awards. The comedian was nominated 24 times and won 8 Emmys - her first in 1951, her last 60 years later in 2011.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-09-18-qtd/)

body:
• Betty White, 96, Earns Standing Ovation At 2018 Emmys:A
    https://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/news/emmys-2018-betty-white-earns-standing-ovation/
  • Betty White Jokes About Being the ‘First Lady of Television’ at the Emmys: ‘She’s That Old’:A
    https://people.com/tv/emmys-2018-betty-white-first-lady-of-television/
